title: Count All Possible Routes
content:
You are given an array of distinct positive integers locations where  represents the position of city . You are also given integers ,  and  representing the starting city, ending city, and the initial amount of fuel you have, respectively.
At each step, if you are at city , you can pick any city  such that  and  and move to city . Moving from city  to city  reduces the amount of fuel you have by . Please notice that  denotes the absolute value of .
Notice that  cannot become negative at any point in time, and that you are allowed to visit any city more than once (including  and ).
Return the count of all possible routes from  to .
Since the answer may be too large, return it modulo .
 










 




All integers in  are distinct.
